product_name: Apple 13-inch MacBook Air: M4 w/ 10-core CPU and 8-core GPU, 256GB SSD - Midnight - MW123LL/A (2025)
short_description:
MacBook Air 13″. Built for Apple Intelligence.

The 13-inch MacBook Air with the M4 chip lets you fly through work and play. With Apple Intelligence, a brilliant Liquid Retina display, up to 18 hours of battery life, and a strikingly thin and light design, it’s built to last and can take on just about anything, anywhere.

SUPERCHARGED BY M4—The Apple M4 chip brings even more speed and fluidity to everything you do, like working across multiple apps, editing videos, or playing graphically demanding games.

BUILT FOR APPLE INTELLIGENCE—Apple Intelligence is the personal intelligence system that helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly. With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data—not even Apple.

UP TO 18 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE—MacBook Air delivers the same amazing performance whether it’s running on battery or plugged in.

PORTABLE DESIGN—Superlight and less than half an inch thin, MacBook Air fits easily into your bag—and your on-the-go lifestyle.

A BRILLIANT DISPLAY—The 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display supports one billion colors. Photos and videos pop with rich contrast and sharp detail, and text appears supercrisp.

LOOK AND SOUND YOUR BEST—Everything looks and sounds amazing with a 12MP Center Stage camera, three mics, and four speakers with Spatial Audio.

CONNECT IT ALL—MacBook Air features two Thunderbolt 4 ports, a MagSafe charging port, a headphone jack, Wi-Fi 6E, and Bluetooth 5.3. And it supports up to two external displays.

APPS FLY IN MACOS—All your favorites run lightning fast in macOS, including Microsoft 365, Adobe Creative Cloud, and Google Workspace.

IF YOU LOVE IPHONE, YOU’LL LOVE MAC—Mac works like magic with your other Apple devices. View and control what’s on your iPhone from your Mac with iPhone Mirroring. Copy something on iPhone and paste it on Mac. Send texts with Messages or use your Mac to make and answer FaceTime calls.

In The Box

13-inch MacBook Air
USB-C to MagSafe 3 Cable (2 m)
USB-C Power Adapter

Legal

Configurable options are available.

Apple Intelligence is available in beta on all Mac models with M1 and later, with Siri and device language set to English (Australia, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, South Africa, UK, or U.S.), as a macOS Sequoia update. Additional features and Chinese (Simplified), English (India, Singapore), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), and Spanish language support available in early April, with more languages coming over the course of the year, including Vietnamese. Some features may not be available in all regions or languages.
Battery life varies by use and configuration. See apple.com/batteries for more information.

The display on the 13-inch MacBook Air has rounded corners at the top. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 13.6 inches diagonally (actual viewable area is less).

Wi-Fi 6E available in countries and regions where supported.

Apps are available on the App Store. Software and content may be sold separately.
Title availability is subject to change. Available on Mac computers with Apple silicon and Intel-based Mac computers with a T2 Security Chip. Requires that your iPhone and Mac are signed in with the same Apple Account using two-factor authentication, your iPhone and Mac are near each other and have Bluetooth and Wi-Fi turned on, and your Mac is not using AirPlay or Sidecar. Some iPhone features (e.g., camera and microphone) are not compatible with iPhone Mirroring.

FaceTime is not available in all countries or regions.

More about the Periphio Warp: The Periphio Warp-5600 is powered by the AMD Ryzen 5 with Radeon Vega 7 Graphics. Ready on day one for PC gaming, the Warp is prebuilt inside one of our most unique PC gaming cases, the Portal, and is one of the best, most affordable gaming PCs available today!

WHO IS PERIPHIO?

Periphio is run by PC gamers and built around the simple idea of building the best gaming computers for every budget. We build brand-new gaming desktops that provide the latest and greatest gaming experience, as well as Hybrid gaming computers that use a blend of repurposed and new hardware to maximize your dollar.

WHY BUY FROM PERIPHIO?

Whether it's an all-new Gaming PC or a Hybrid-Renewed system, every gaming computer from Periphio is thoughtfully designed from the case itself to the hardware that powers your gaming. Hours of R&D goes into each configuration, including parts selection, optimized cooling, bottleneck avoidance, Overclocked RAM in Dual channel mode, BIOS Updates, and more. Every PC from Periphio includes the added confidence of a full-system warranty and lifetime tech support! Built with passion and care, join the thousands of others who trust Periphio as "Your Path to PC Gaming."

Storage is fast and plentiful with a 1TB M. 2 NVMe SSD, ensuring lightning-quick boot times and game load speeds. Cooling is handled by the Hyper 212 RGB air cooler, keeping the system running at peak performance while adding stylish flair. The reliable 650W Gold-rated PSU supports future upgrades, while the AVGPC Max Air-flow m-ATX case ensures optimal thermal performance with modern aesthetics. Built with quality components on a solid AMD B550 motherboard, the system supports expandability and long-term use.

Pre-installed with Windows 11, WiFi/Bluetooth connectivity, and VR readiness, its fully equipped for today's gaming and entertainment demands. Every unit is built and backed in the USA and comes with lifetime support from experienced technicians giving you peace of mind long after your purchase.
